name: ListSurveyRequests
description:
Retrieve a list of all survey requests.

Call this tool to get an overview of all survey requests currently listed. Useful for accessing details on candidate surveys when you have the necessary permissions.

parameters.name: survey_request_filters
parameters.description: JSON object to filter survey requests. Include criteria like date range, status, or candidate details.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
